Microsoft Windows 8.1 - AiO 6in1 PT-BR Official - build 9600
Updated 8/22/2013
During the 2013 edition of the Build event, held on June 26, Microsoft officially announced Windows 8.1 - an update much anticipated by fans of the company's system of Bill Gates.

Apparently, Microsoft has listened carefully to the feedback given by users of Windows 8 and promoted some adjustments to meet the requests of many people.

Among the new features are the return of the Start button, the OS boot with direct loading to Desktop, improving the integration of the platform with Bing and Skype, the largest variety of customization options and more!


ISO is included in:

Windows 8.1 Pro x64 EN (Home Use)

Windows 8.1 Pro x86 EN (Home Use)

Windows 8.1 Core x64 PT-BR (Server)

Windows 8.1 Core x86 PT-BR (Server)

Windows 8.1 Enterprise x64 PT-BR (Company)

Windows 8.1 Enterprise x86 PT-BR (Company)

Native operating system in Portuguese - BR.

1 Burn the ISO to a DVD9 or a USB FLASH DRIVE USB 8GB
